<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[The Harder They Fall (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=3901) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Kingmaker</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 23</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Titan Wrestler](/Feats.aspx?ID=854)

</column>

---

You know how to make a larger creature hurt when it falls to the ground. If you successfully [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) a foe that's larger than you, it takes 1d8 bludgeoning damage (or 2d8 bludgeoning damage on a critical success). If you are master in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3), the damage increases to 2d8 bludgeoning (or 4d8 bludgeoning on a critical success).

<title level="2">Adventuring with Ekundayo</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 23</row>

Ekundayo eventually develops his own methods to pursue his favored enemies—giants. Once he gains the Magical Crafting feat at 4th level, he begins to craft specialized ammunition and runes for weapons. As long as his attitude toward the PCs is at least friendly, he shares these discoveries with them, unlocking the following ranger class feats and items as soon as his level equals the level of the feat or item.

**Related Feats**: [Giant Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=3900), [Giant Slayer](/Feats.aspx?ID=3904), [Hamstringing Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=3902), [Roll with It (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=3903)
